long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Who Is?" is an engaging puzzle game developed by Unico Studio addictive game available as a Chrome extension. In this game, players are presented with a wide range of challenging scenarios and are required to think creatively in order to solve them. With over a hundred levels, each one offering something unique, boredom is never an issue. The game features various types of puzzles, including choice-based scenarios like determining the imposter or identifying a liar, as well as riddles that involve finding hidden objects and much more. If you find yourself stuck, there's a helpful hint system available, and you also have the option to skip levels if needed. Who is having fun? Well, it's definitely you if you play this game and share the experience with your friends. You can enjoy "Who Is?" for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/.


*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website https://classroom-6x.org, https://poki.ee
